title: The Feast of the Goat (La fiesta del chivo, 2005)

sources.title: TheFeastOfTheGoat LaFiestaDelChivo2005
sources.description: Synopsis Urania Cabral returns to Santo Domingo, after several years, and remembers her and her family's relationship to Rafael Trujillo, the Dominican dictator, as well as the events surrounding his assassination. Based on the best-selling novel by Mario Vargas Llosa, this is the story of Urania Cabral, a beautiful, kind, intelligent and independent Manhattan lawyer wom, after 30 years returns to RepÃºblica Dominicana to face her ghosts... and the horrifying circumstances that altered her life forever when she was a teenager and Rafael LeÃ³nidas Trujillo a.k.a El Chivo (The Goat) was the iron-handed ruler of this island paradise... after Urania faces her past, nothing in her present or future will ever be the same again. -- IMDb Cast: Tomas Milian ... Rafael Leonidas Trujillo Isabella Rossellini ... Urania Paul Freeman ... AgustÃ­n Cabral Juan Diego Botto ... Amadito GarcÃ­a Guerrero Stephanie Leonidas ... Uranita Shawn Elliott ...
